definitions: combine or coordinate the activity of (two or more agents) to produce a joint effect greater than the sum of their separate effects

examples.text: the two companies have been looking for ways to synergize their businesses
we have been able to synergize our efforts in supporting this worthy cause

shortDefinitions: combine multiple agents to produce effect greater than sum of separate ones

definitions: interact or cooperate with one or more other agents to produce a joint effect greater than the sum of effects achieved separately

examples.text: the team has developed a device that synergizes with conventional antibiotic therapies

shortDefinitions: interact with other agents to produce joint effect
